post.title: Summer T.I.T.S Assets
post.description: These are Summer themed 3D assets that can be used on VtuberPlus and other programs!
post.content:
These are Summer themed 3D assets that can be used on VtuberPlus. These assets are free to use but credit is appreciated! Resale is strictly prohibited!

Contact me on Twitter if you need assistance! (๑•̀ㅂ•́)و✧
